full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## Background

The Department of National Defence is seeking a supplier to provide various parts, including bolts, swivel joints, and wire.

## Solicitation Information

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | W8482-229560/A |
| Publication Date | 31 August 2022 |
| Tender Closing Date | 5 October 2022, 14:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | None |
| Expected Contract End Date | None |
| Tender Status | Expired |

## Required Goods and Services

The following goods and services are required:

* Bolts (Item 1-6)
* Swivel Joints (Item 7-8)
* Wire (Item 3-4 and 10)

| Item # | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | 12 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 2 | 12 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 3 | 10 | KG | CFB Halifax |
| 4 | 5 | KG | CFB Esquimalt |
| 5 | 24 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 6 | 24 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 7 | 6 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 8 | 13 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 9 | 110 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 10 | 173 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |

## Specifications

* Items 1-6: Bolts (GSIN 5306, NSN 12-370-2235)
* Items 3-4 and 10: Wire (GSIN 9505, NSN 12-325-3223)
* Item 7-8: Swivel Joints (GSIN 4730, NSN 12-352-1498)
* Item 9: Plugs (GSIN 5365, NSN 12-349-4515)

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contact Information

* Mr. Xavier McNeill
* Email: [xavier.mcneill@forces.gc.ca](mailto:xavier.mcneill@forces.gc.ca)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2

## Note
